messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to suggestions made by social justice groups we have upgraded your dorms area

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "my roblox place (please dont grief it)".

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Captain here, Ian isss now the co-captain, anyone who arguesss againssst thisss can ssspace themssselvesss

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There isss an Ian impossstor on the ssstation, they mussst be captured for being a bad boy

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The fake Ian isss dead, I feel sssad now

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Quartermaster's Office.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: By order of high command we order that you execute that fake corgi

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: If you do not kill the corgi in the next 30 minutes we will cut your funding in half and get rid of all your weed.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we will also demote you all to janitors if you don't kill that corgi

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: scans indicate that they didn't use the gateway by the way

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
